original_title: Annie: the Women in the Life of a Man
overview: A CBS television special, renowned for its legendary "Yma, Ava....Yma, Uta... Yma, Oona" sequence.  Annie: the Women in the Life of a Man (1970), won Anne Bancroft her only Emmy for her portrayal of 14 different woman in 14 musical and comedy sketches. Bancroft's husband Mel Brooks contributed to the script and also appears onscreen.
tagline: Bancroft funny. Bancroft sad. Bancroft singing and dancing. Watch and be dazzled.
title: Annie: the Women in the Life of a Man
